verses.verse: And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the steward <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the men's <S%H376><s%> sacks <S%H572><s%> with food, <S%H400><s%> as much as <S%H834><s%> they can <S%H3201><s%> carry, <S%H5375><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in his sack's <S%H572><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

And put <S%H7760><s%> my cup, <S%H1375><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> cup, <S%H1375><s%> in the sack's <S%H572><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the youngest, <S%H6996><s%> and his corn <S%H7668><s%> money. <S%H3701><s%> And he did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had spoken. <S%H1696><s%>
As soon as the morning <S%H1242><s%> was light, <S%H215><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> were sent away, <S%H7971><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> and their asses. <S%H2543><s%>

And when they <S%H1992><s%> were gone out of <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> yet far off, <S%H7368><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his steward, <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1004><s%> Up, <S%H6965><s%> follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the men; <S%H376><s%> and when thou dost overtake <S%H5381><s%> them, say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> have ye rewarded <S%H7999><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> good? <S%H2896><s%>

Is not <S%H3808><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> it in which <S%H834><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> drinketh, <S%H8354><s%> and whereby indeed he divineth? <S%H1931><s%> <S%H5172><s%> <S%H5172><s%> ye have done evil <S%H7489><s%> in so <S%H834><s%> doing. <S%H6213><s%>
And he overtook <S%H5381><s%> them, and he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them <S%H853><s%> these same <S%H428><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> saith <S%H1696><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words? <S%H1697><s%> God forbid <S%H2486><s%> that thy servants <S%H5650><s%> should do <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> according to this <S%H2088><s%> thing: <S%H1697><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the money, <S%H3701><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we found <S%H4672><s%> in our sacks' <S%H572><s%> mouths, <S%H6310><s%> we brought again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Canaan: <S%H3667><s%> how <S%H349><s%> then should we steal <S%H1589><s%> out of thy lord's house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H113><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> or <S%H176><s%> gold? <S%H2091><s%>

With <S%H854><s%> whomsoever <S%H834><s%> of thy servants <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5650><s%> it be found, <S%H4672><s%> both let him die, <S%H4191><s%> and we <S%H587><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> my lord's <S%H113><s%> bondmen. <S%H5650><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3651><s%> let it <S%H1931><s%> be according unto your words: <S%H1697><s%> he with <S%H854><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> it is found <S%H4672><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> my servant; <S%H5650><s%> and ye <S%H859><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> blameless. <S%H5355><s%>

Then they speedily <S%H4116><s%> took down <S%H3381><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sack <S%H572><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and opened <S%H6605><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sack. <S%H572><s%>

And he searched, <S%H2664><s%> and began <S%H2490><s%> at the eldest, <S%H1419><s%> and left <S%H3615><s%> at the youngest: <S%H6996><s%> and the cup <S%H1375><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> in Benjamin's <S%H1144><s%> sack. <S%H572><s%>
Then they rent <S%H7167><s%> their clothes, <S%H8071><s%> and laded <S%H6006><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ass, <S%H2543><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> for he <S%H1931><s%> was yet <S%H5750><s%> there: <S%H8033><s%> and they fell <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him on the ground. <S%H776><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, What <S%H4100><s%> deed <S%H4639><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye have done? <S%H6213><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> ye not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> such a man <S%H376><s%> as I <S%H3644><s%> can certainly divine? <S%H5172><s%> <S%H5172><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall we say <S%H559><s%> unto my lord? <S%H113><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall we speak? <S%H1696><s%> or how <S%H4100><s%> shall we clear ourselves? <S%H6663><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath found out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of thy servants: <S%H5650><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are my lord's <S%H113><s%> servants, <S%H5650><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we, <S%H587><s%> and he also <S%H1571><s%> with whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found. <S%H4672><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> God forbid <S%H2486><s%> that I should do <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> so: <S%H2063><s%> but the man <S%H376><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found, <S%H4672><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> my servant; <S%H5650><s%> and as for you, <S%H859><s%> get you up <S%H5927><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> your father. <S%H1><s%>

Then Judah <S%H3063><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> unto him, <S%H413><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Oh <S%H994><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> let thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in my lord's <S%H113><s%> ears, <S%H241><s%> and let not <S%H408><s%> thine anger <S%H639><s%> burn <S%H2734><s%> against thy servant: <S%H5650><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou art even as <S%H3644><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
My lord <S%H113><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> <S%H853><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Have <S%H3426><s%> ye a father, <S%H1><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a brother? <S%H251><s%>

And we said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> We have <S%H3426><s%> a father, <S%H1><s%> an old man, <S%H2205><s%> and a child <S%H3206><s%> of his old age, <S%H2208><s%> a little one; <S%H6996><s%> and his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead, <S%H4191><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> is left <S%H3498><s%> of his mother, <S%H517><s%> and his father <S%H1><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> him.

And thou saidst <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> Bring him down <S%H3381><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, that I may set <S%H7760><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him.

And we said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> The lad <S%H5288><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father: <S%H1><s%> for if he should leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> his father would die. <S%H4191><s%>

And thou saidst <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> Except <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you, ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> we came up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> we told <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of my lord. <S%H113><s%>
And our father <S%H1><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Go again, <S%H7725><s%> and buy <S%H7666><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>

And we said, <S%H559><s%> We cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> go down: <S%H3381><s%> if <S%H518><s%> our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us, then will we go down: <S%H3381><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> we may <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the man's <S%H376><s%> face, <S%H6440><s%> except <S%H369><s%> our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> be with <S%H854><s%> us.

And thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, Ye <S%H859><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> my wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> me two <S%H8147><s%> sons:

And the one <S%H259><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> me, and I said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> he is torn in pieces; <S%H2963><s%> <S%H2963><s%> and I saw <S%H7200><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> since: <S%H5704><s%> <S%H2008><s%>

And if ye take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> me, <S%H6440><s%> and mischief <S%H611><s%> befall <S%H7136><s%> him, ye shall bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H7451><s%> to the grave. <S%H7585><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore when I come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and the lad <S%H5288><s%> be not <S%H369><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us; seeing that his life <S%H5315><s%> is bound up <S%H7194><s%> in the lad's life; <S%H5315><s%>

It shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%> is not <S%H369><s%> with us, that he will die: <S%H4191><s%> and thy servants <S%H5650><s%> shall bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to the grave. <S%H7585><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> became surety <S%H6148><s%> for <S%H853><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%> unto <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, then I shall bear the blame <S%H2398><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%> forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> let thy servant <S%H5650><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> instead of <S%H8478><s%> the lad <S%H5288><s%> a bondman <S%H5650><s%> to my lord; <S%H113><s%> and let the lad <S%H5288><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> his brethren. <S%H251><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> how <S%H349><s%> shall I go up <S%H5927><s%> to <S%H413><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and the lad <S%H5288><s%> be not <S%H369><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me? lest peradventure <S%H6435><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall come on <S%H4672><s%> <S%H853><s%> my father. <S%H1><s%>
